org.dapper

Class DapperBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dapper.DapperBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class DapperBase
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A utility class for common Dapper operations.
